songs.title: My Way*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics From Snippet

[Verse]

We the best Boy, you better keep one or think twice
Notice I'm the best one to keep by
Guess I shouldn't stay so

[Chorus]
You say I learn the lessons on the hard way
It take every ounce of effort just to parlay
Boy, it's always in my favor, it go my way, my way
